articles.title: Chris Hemsworth runs a futuristic jail in Netflix’s Spiderhead - Polygon
articles.description: Based on a George Saunders short story, Spiderhead follows a futuristic prison where the punishment is loads of experimental drugs. Starring Chris Hemsworth, Miles Teller, and Jurnee Smollet, the movie comes out on June 17.
